Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Adams
ShortDescription: #151 Sheridan buses temp. rerouted NB: Mchgn, Rsm't, State, Monroe & Mchgn; SB: Mchgn, Madison, State, Rsm't & Mchgn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Michigan/Adams.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Roosevelt, State, Monroe and Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Madison, State, Roosevelt and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.
